caption.title: Histological analysis of testes and epididymides at 6 weeks post-inoculation.
caption.p: IFNAR1-KO mice were infected with PRVABC59 (A–D), ZIKV/Hu/Chiba/S36/2016 (E–H), or ZIKV/Hu/NIID123/2016 (I–L) and euthanized at 6 weeks post-inoculation. Scale bars: 1,000 μm in left panels (testes), 100 μm in right panels (epididymides). HE: hematoxylin and eosin staining; Anti-ZIKV: immunohistochemistry of ZIKV NS1 antigen.
